Ihe ọkpụkpụ Eze Nwanyị Amina bụ ihe ọkpụkpụ na-agba ịnyịnya iji sọpụrụ Eze Nwanyie Amina, Eze Nwanyị nke Zazzau. Ọ bụ Ben Ekanem chepụtara ihe ọkpụkpụ ahụ na 1975 n'oge emume nke abụọ nke Black na African Festival of Arts and Culture ma tinye ya n'ọnụ ụzọ nke National Arts Theatre na Lagos State. E bibiri ya na 2005 n'ihi ihu igwe mana onye na-ese ihe na-enweghị akara mepụtara ya na 2014.
Queen Amina bụ nwa nwanyị mbụ nke Queen Bakwa Turunku, onye guzobere ala eze Zazzau
Ọ bụ eze nwanyị Agha Hausa nke Zazzau nke chịrị na mmalite narị afọ nke iri na isii. E mere ihe oyiyi Queen Amina iji cheta obi ike na ike ya.
Ihe ọkpụkpụ Eze Nwanyị Amina bụ nnukwu ọla nchara na ihe a tụrụ atụ
Ọ na-egosi Queen Amina ji mpako na-eburu mma agha ya mgbe ọ na-agba ịnyịnya guzo ọtọ.
